title: Low carb hot chocolate
ingredients: ['1 1/2 teaspoons your favorite sugar-free baking cocoa, such as Cadbury® Bournville', '1 to 2 tablespoons double cream', '3 rounded teaspoons Splenda® sugar subsitute or 4 Splenda® tablets', '1/8 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt (optional)', 'boiling water as needed']
